desc.introduce:
03/06「冰原孤岛」法国融合爵士组合Alexandre Herer "Nunataq" 2025中国巡演 广州站

  

冰原岛峰（源于因纽特语“Nunataq”）是指在环绕的冰川中突出而且没被陆冰覆盖的山顶。冰原岛峰的野生动物或会被冰川阻隔，就像海洋中的岛屿。冰原岛峰一般为带菱角和锯齿状的，是冻融侵蚀所造成，而下方受冰川侵蚀的土地轮廓比较柔和。该词源于格陵兰语，自19世纪70 年代开始在英语世界中使用。

A nunatak (from Inuit nunataq) is the summit or ridge of a mountain that protrudes from an ice field or glacier that otherwise covers most of the mountain or ridge. They often form natural pyramidal peaks. Isolated nunataks are also called glacial islands. The word is of Greenlandic origin and has been used in English since the 1870s.

  

Alexandre Herer – Nunataq

Alexandre Herer : Fender Rhodes

Gaël Petrina : Bass

Pierre Mangeard : Drums

 

在花了十几年深入探索他最喜欢的乐器 Fender Rhodes之后，Alexandre带着全新组合NUNATAQ回来了！

在其职业生涯中，Alexandre与Magic Malik、Jozef Dumoulin、Marc Ducret、Stéphane Payen、Julien Pontvianne 和 Olivier Laisney 等拥有强大艺术能量的著名音乐家合作，也使其拓宽了对音乐概念、作曲和即兴演奏技巧的认知边界。

得益于Alexandre过往的丰富经验积累，NUNATAQ的音乐既内省又开放。它提供了一种开放、舒畅且清凉的气息，部分灵感来自广阔的冰原（如格陵兰岛），这些地域见证了当今人类对自然气候的威胁。

Having spent ten years experimenting with his favorite instrument, the Fender Rhodes, Alexandre Herer comes back with a new project which, for being introspective, is nonetheless open and nourished by his many experiences. From his collaborations with musicians rich of a powerful artistic universe such as Magic Malik, Jozef Dumoulin, Marc Ducret, Stéphane Payen, Julien Pontvianne and Olivier Laisney, Alexandre Herer gradually became familiar with many musical concepts, written repertoires and improvisation techniques. For this project entitled “Nunataq”, Alexandre Herer offers a music that is deliberately open, airy and cold, partly inspired by the vast iced stretches (such as Greenland), places that remains the witnesses of a past climate threatened by today’s humanity.

 

Alexandre Herer : Fender Rhodes

Alexandre Herer是一位来自法国巴黎的钢琴家和作曲家。在音乐学院学习古典钢琴和爵士乐后，他全身心投入钢琴、作曲和数个乐队项目中。十多年来，他一直在打磨属于自己的声音和个性。他惯用Fender Rhodes，这是他最喜欢的键盘。他的音乐灵感来自爵士乐、即兴音乐和当代音乐，意在沉思，兼具自由性和复杂度。

Alexandre Herer is a pianist and composer. After studying classical piano and jazz at the Conservatory, he devoted himself to piano, composition, and the development of his projects. For more than ten years, he has been honing his sound and personality, often on the Fender Rhodes, his favorite keyboard and a partner in various sound experiments. His music, inspired by jazz, improvised music and contemporary music, is meant to be contemplative, between liberty and complexity.

  

Gaël Petrina : Bass

Gael Petrina 是一位贝斯手/作曲家，拥有来自基多/洛杉矶/伦敦/巴黎的独特多元文化背景。

Gael 深深扎根于爵士乐和即兴音乐（毕业于巴黎国立音乐学院），同时游历于摇滚乐、嘻哈、电子音乐、古典音乐和拉丁音乐等多种风格之间。其演奏风格一丝不苟，由此使他能与当今国际舞台上的顶级艺术家一起演出，在全球一些知名的场地和音乐节上举办了数百场演出。

在2013年他和他所在的墨西哥爵士乐队 Fro Trio赢得了年度爵士大奖La Defense Jazz Festival Prizes三个奖项。

Gael Petrina is a bass player/composer with a unique cultural background Quito/LA/London/Paris.

Heavily rooted in Jazz and improvised music (Conservatoire National Regional de Paris), Gael can also be heard blending genres on the low end on a diverse pallet of musical styles tastefully. Jazz, rock, hip hop, electronica, classical and latin are meticulously executed allowing Gaël to perform with some of the top international artists on the scene today logging in hundreds of shows at some of the most respected venues and festivals on all five continents.

Gael also is member of the mexican jazz group Fro Trio, with whom he won all three prestigious La Defense Jazz Festival Prizes in 2013.

 

Pierre Mangeard : Drums

Pierre出生于勃艮第的一个音乐世家，从小学习单簧管和爵士鼓。

自2008搬至巴黎起，Pierre通过与许多音乐家合作迅速发展了自己的艺术生涯，并且形成了自己的个人风格。他独特的性格和幽默一直是他音乐项目的鲜明特征。

其作品融合了放克、爵士和嘻哈音乐元素，富有表现力。他也在电声方向做了大胆尝试，探索鼓乐、人声、单簧管和电子乐器的创新融合。

Settled in Paris since 2008, Pierre Mangeard collaborated with many musicians and brought his own personal touch. He has become an outstanding performer and released his EP "LE-ME-DOU-AI", an expressive fusion of his funk, jazz, and hip-hop influences, using his voice as a rhythmic extension of the drums. A concentrate of jazz and groovy transcendence, an ode to freedom and second degree. A project in the image of his unprecedented journey and his exuberant nature. In 2023, his solo electro-acoustic project emerged, exploring an innovative blend of drums, vocals, clarinet, and electronic instruments.

His unique character and humor have always been distinctive features of his musical projects.

  

巡演信息

3/08（六）珠海 金爵士艺术中心

realName.description: 该项目需实名制认证，请认证后再进行购票

importantNotes.content: 票品为有价票券，非普通商品，其背后承载的文化服务具有时效性，稀缺性等特征，不支持退换。
importantNotes.title: 退票/换票规则

importantNotes.content: 须打开【票夹】扫码入场，截图无效。
importantNotes.title: 入场方式说明

importantNotes.content: 1.2米以上凭成人票入场，1.2米以下谢绝入场
importantNotes.title: 儿童购票

importantNotes.content: 演出开始前，去【订单详情页】提交发票申请。我们会将电子发票发送至您的邮箱。
importantNotes.title: 发票说明

importantNotes.content: 一张门票对应一个证件；证件支持：台湾居民来往大陆通行证/护照/身份证/港澳居民来往内地通行证
importantNotes.title: 购票证件说明

importantNotes.content:
对于异常订购行为，大麦网有权在订单成立或者生效之后取消相应订单。异常订购行为包括但不限于以下情形：
（1）通过同一ID订购超出限购张数的订单。
（2）经合理判断认为非真实消费者的下单行为，包括但不限于通过批量相同或虚构的支付账号、收货地址（包括下单时填写及最终实际收货地址）、收件人、电话号码订购超出限购张数的订单。
importantNotes.title: 异常排单说明

importantNotes.content: 1.购买前请您提前规划好行程，做好相应准备，以免影响您的正常观演，感谢您的理解和配合。2.若演出受不可抗力影响延期或取消，大麦将对演出票订单按照项目官方通知方案进行处理，其他因观演发生的费用需由您自行承担。
importantNotes.title: 温馨提示

importantNotes.content: 请于演出前约30分钟入场
importantNotes.title: 入场时间

importantNotes.content: 由于安保和版权的原因，大多数演出、展览及比赛场所禁止携带食品、饮料、专业摄录设备、打火机等物品，请您注意现场工作人员和广播的提示，予以配合
importantNotes.title: 禁止携带物品

importantNotes.content: 无寄存处,请自行保管携带物品，谨防贵重物品丢失。
importantNotes.title: 寄存说明
